song_lyrics: Pe’rī nepur chālatā ṭhamake re, shobhe Shrī Ghanshyām,
Keḍe kandoro ghūgharī ghamake re, shobhe Shrī Ghanshyām... Pe’rī
Veḍh vīṭī chhe nang jaḍāv re, shobhe Shrī Ghanshyām,
Hem bāju chhe khūb banāv re, shobhe Shrī Ghanshyām... Pe’rī
Pe’ryā kanak kaḍā beu hāthe re, shobhe Shrī Ghanshyām,
Sonā sākaḷā peryā chhe māre nāthe re, shobhe Shrī Ghanshyām... Pe’rī
Beu kānmā kunḍaḷ laḷake re, shobhe Shrī Ghanshyām,
Ur motīnī māḷā zaḷake re, shobhe Shrī Ghanshyām... Pe’rī
Pe’rī sākaḷī ne sonānā ḍām re, shobhe Shrī Ghanshyām,
Manjukeshānandnā Shyām re, shobhe Shrī Ghanshyām... Pe’rī
title: Pe’rī nepur chālatā ṭhamake re shobhe Shrī Ghanshyām

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-9020: Sadguru Manjukeshanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad
